name: It's All Dice
description:
On a park bench, a war between dice is going near a board game. You are the last surviving die of the other team - you have to survive, hoping that the dice being used in your weapon roll to your advantage. 

Your weapon uses a series of dice, from the enemy, to generate its damage values. You can convert the dices you gather into rolls for upgrades to your weapon.

Attributions: 'Multiple Dice Rolling'(https://opengameart.org/content/multiple-dice-rolling) by Justin Nichol is licensed under CC-BY, is used as the projectile hit sound, and the soundtrack is derived from it.  'Cannon fire'(https://opengameart.org/content/cannon-fire) by Thimras is licensed under CC0 and is used as the weapon firing noise.
